content: simple popcorn stitches add texture and warmth to this worked-from-the-middle crochet blanket you ll work in rounds in double_crochet and popcorn to reveal the gorgeous gradients of our easy-care red heart super saver ombre make it as shown or choose a different color to match your décor or mood the shape is unique so it s a stylish and unexpected way to add personality to a room ~~~~~~~~~~~~ approx 72 / 185 cm diameter from peak to peak and excluding tassels red heart super saver ombre 10 oz/283 g 482 yds/440 m purple 3964 4 balls size u s i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook gauge 12 single_crochet and 13 row = 4 / 10 cm
